Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Kuwaiti Ambassador
   Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, was presented with credentials by Faisal Rashed Al-Ghais, Kuwaiti ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
 Present there were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun and Kuwaiti embassy officials.    
 After receiving the credentials Kim Yong Nam had a conversation with the ambassador.

articles.content:
Protocol for 2007 Sports Exchange between DPRK and China Signed
   Pyongyang, September 28 (KCNA) -- A protocol for sports exchange for 2007 between the DPRK Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission and the General Administration of Sports of China was signed here Thursday.
 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Kim Jang San, vice-chairman of the commission, and officials concerned and from the Chinese side members of the delegation of the general administration headed by its Vice-Minister Xiao Tian and Zhang Yongwen, cultural councilor of the Chinese embassy here.    
 The protocol was signed by Kim Jang San and Xiao Tian.
